original.title: 10 U.S. Companies Quietly Cutting Millions of Jobs in 2026
original.description:
U.S. companies are cutting jobs at a rapid pace — and 2026 may be even more painful.

In this video, we examine 10 U.S. companies expected to carry out the largest layoffs in 2026 and uncover what’s really behind the cuts. From tech giants to retail brands and long-established corporations, job losses are spreading across industries once considered safe.

We break down why companies are shrinking their workforces, how rising debt, automation, and weakening demand are driving decisions, and what it all means for workers, families, and local economies. Whether you’re currently employed, searching for work, investing, or simply trying to understand where the U.S. economy is headed, this video puts the pieces together in clear, straightforward terms.

This isn’t just a story about layoffs — it’s about the future of work in America.

⚠️ Disclaimer: This content is for educational and informational purposes only. It does not constitute financial, legal, or emergency preparedness advice. Always verify information with official sources.
